<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glideapp.dashboards" name="Responsive Dashboards" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" state="published" type="feature_set" help="CSHelp:Responsive-dashboards" trackable="true" cache_flush="true">
<description>Easily create, modify and share dashboards using responsive and dynamic widget layouts.</description>
<requires> <import plugin="com.glideapp.canvas"/> <import plugin="com.glideapp.home"/> <import plugin="com.glide.text_search" /> <import plugin="com.glide.db_images" /> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.angular"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng"/> <import plugin="com.snc.pa"/> </requires>
<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="dashboardLoader" class="com.snc.dashboards.scriptable.DashboardLoaderScript"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="dashboardPermissionsMigration" class="com.snc.dashboards.scriptable.DashboardPermissionsMigrationScript"/> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="dashboardProcessor" class="com.snc.dashboards.processors.DashboardProcessor" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="dashboardPermissionsProcessor" class="com.snc.dashboards.processors.ManageDashboardsPermissions" />
</plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Easily create, modify and share dashboards using responsive and dynamic widget layouts.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:Responsive-dashboards</help> <id>com.glideapp.dashboards</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Responsive Dashboards</name> <path>plugin://com.glideapp.dashboards/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glideapp.canvas,com.glideapp.home,com.glide.text_search,com.glide.db_images,com.glide.ui.angular,com.glide.ui.ng,com.snc.pa</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glideapp.dashboards</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>feature_set</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
